short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switch tabs faster using ctrl+period to go left and ctrl+comma to go right.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Quicker Tab Switcher allows you to switch easily between tabs without the mouse.

Use ctrl+period to go right one tab, and ctrl+comma to go left one tab (command+period and command+comma on macOS). If you find yourself switching tabs a lot and spending too much time and effort doing that, this extension is for you! It is now easier and faster to switch tabs in a window!

This extension requires no permissions because it is a very simple program. You can view the commented source code at https://github.com/i8sumPi/quickerTabSwitcher/.
